about_the_game:
A malevolent businessman named Epstein disappears in 2019 with the help of the government and influential business people, faking his own death. Secretly, he buys an island where he begins kidnapping people from different countries to conduct experiments, aiming to achieve world domination. Government officials and powerful figures, especially Danold Tramp, support his plans.

Michael J. is devastated when his mother, Teressa, suddenly vanishes. While working at Danold Tramp's company, Teressa is kidnapped along with other selected employees and taken to the island. The government closes the opened cases and obstructs those trying to track Epstein. However, one day, Michael finds a note in a mailbox near his home, sent by Epstein to a government official. This note reveals the location of the island and the horrifying experiments taking place there.

Determined to find his mother and stop Epstein's plans, Michael sets out for the island. He must survive in a mysterious mansion, tension-filled tunnels, a terrifying hospital, and a prison that includes Danold Tramp. While solving mysteries and facing terrifying moments, he must find his mother and uncover the truth.

Epstein2 offers an adventure filled with suspense and horror. In this game, full of mysteries, puzzles, and frightening moments, you will struggle to survive and reveal the truth.

!Craft New Tools for Survival!

Combine items to create critical tools necessary for your survival. For example, when the camera's battery runs out, you can change its battery, combine a lighter with a candle, or fill a kerosene lamp with gasoline.



!Mystery Hunter!

Uncover mysterious secrets with the items you collect around you and take one step closer to the clues.



!To Survive and Uncover the Truth on the Fearful Island: Either Hide or Fight!

If you are equipped, you can kill these creatures that have turned morbid by shooting them in the head, but if you are unequipped, just run and hide because they are right behind you.

content_descriptors.notes: The game design includes bloody visuals and depictions. The environmental design and storytelling also feature horror visuals.

short_description: Join detective Michael in his psychological horror-filled adventure to gather evidence and find his mother on Epstein's dark island. In this single-player game, read notes carefully, collect equipment to protect yourself from aggressive test subjects, and uncover the truth...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
